newsitem.title: USA: Jostens says $1.52 FY97 EPS view too high.
newsitem.headline: Jostens says $1.52 FY97 EPS view too high.

text.p: Jostens Inc Chief Executive Officer Robert said Thursday that analysts' estimates that the company would earn $1.52 a share in fiscal 1997 were too high.

"What I'm trying to do is get into double-digit earnings increases and get enough money reinvested in our business. We could do that ($1.52). We might do that. But it's a little higher than what I'd book," Buhrmaster said.
The company's 1997 fiscal year ends in June. Jostens reported earnings of $1.28 a share in fiscal 1996.
